title: Trump Threatens to Veto Defense Bill If Tech Liability Provision Stands
sub_head: President is demanding termination of the broad legal immunity that social-media companies enjoy
body:
WASHINGTON—President Trump threatened to veto an annual defense-policy bill if it doesn’t include language overturning a provision that gives social-media companies broad immunity for the content they publish from users on their sites.
Mr. Trump demanded on Tuesday night that Section 230 of the 1996 Communications Decency Act be repealed.
